message: I think I deserve a bit more, 60/40 is a good deal.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think 50/50 is fair. How about 55/45?
I'm willing to meet you halfway between my previous offer and your last offer. 58/42 is a good compromise.
Let's get back to fairness.  I'm willing to do 50/50 again. We're both losing money with each round.
